alerts.title: SSH open to world

alerts.remediation: Restrict SSH access to specific IP ranges or use VPN/bastion host

alerts.title: AWS collection error
alerts.description: Error occurred during AWS data collection
alerts.remediation: Check AWS credentials and permissions, review error logs

log_excerpt.description: GuardDuty security collection failed: An error occurred (SubscriptionRequiredException) when calling the ListDetectors operation: The AWS Access Key Id needs a subscription for the service

raw_event.error: An error occurred (SubscriptionRequiredException) when calling the ListDetectors operation: The AWS Access Key Id needs a subscription for the service
